department.dept_long_name: Department of Romance Languages and Literatures

course.title: Reading Italian
course.faculty_text: Elvira G. DiFabio and members of the Department
course.description: For students (both undergraduate and graduate) with little or no knowledge of Italian. Aims at the rapid development of reading skills as a tool for research. Selections of materials in accordance with the needs of the participants.
course.prerequisites: Some previous study of a Romance language helpful but not necessary. Fluency in English required.
course.notes: Not open to auditors. May not be used to fulfill the language requirement. May not be taken Pass/Fail, but may be taken Sat/Unsat by GSAS students.
